section.section:
If the driver of a vehicle approaches a railroad grade crossing under any of the circumstances stated in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the driver:
Shall stop within 50 feet but not less than 15 feet from the nearest rail in the crossing; and
May not proceed until he can do so safely.

text.section: A person may not drive any vehicle through, around, or under any crossing gate or barrier at a railroad grade crossing while the gate or barrier is closed or is being opened or closed.
